snippet: The Nets arrived in Miami as a threat to dislodge the Heat from the top spot in the Eastern Conference standings. They left late Saturday duly humbled, after a 13-point loss.
lead_paragraph: The Nets arrived in Miami as a threat to dislodge the Heat from the top spot in the Eastern Conference standings. They left late Saturday duly humbled, after a 13-point loss.

headline.seo: Nets Fall to Heat After Second Half of Missed Shots and Turnovers
headline.main: Nets Fall Apart in Second Half With Missed Shots and Turnovers
headline.print_headline: Nets Fall Apart in Second Half With Missed Shots and Turnovers vs. the Heat
